page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW
page.content: PART OF USK AND RURAL AREA,GWENT - A rural hilly area of pasture, woodlands, family farms, houses and hamlets. Bounded in the West by the River Usk, in the South by Usk houses. The Eastern boundary is west of the main trunk route A449 linked to Usk by the A472. EDUCATION - Usk College of Agriculture and Usk School and Community Centre. HISTORIC BUILDINGS - the castle, two disused Mills and Catholic Church. Salmon and Trout fishing. RECREATION - area on the "Island"; local caravan sites and bed and breakfast accommodation for tourists. Walk and footpaths. Weather. TRANSPORT - cars, buses, lorries. LOCAL AUTHORITY SERVICE - Fire Brigade. HOUSING - home ownership. EMPLOYMENT - is in farming in local businesses, nearby factories and Usk Agricultural College.
